oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Kyle and Melissa Triplett - 2018-11-10
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Kyle and Melissa Triplett as part of the Bluegrass and Beyond annual celebration from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on November 10, 2018. First performance of four.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Kyle Triplett; Melissa Triplett;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Opening comments by Ben Hall begins in progress / (03:17) Introduction of Jim Hurst / (04:16) Jim introduces Kyle and Melissa Triplett / (06:07) Performs Gentle On My Mind (Kyle-vocal) / (10:04) Performs Unidentified Song (Melissa-vocal) / (13:21) Comments by Kyle / (14:05) Performs When I Die (Melissa-vocal) / (17:11) Comments from Kyle and Melissa / (17:58) Performs Bury Me Beneath the Weeping Willow Tree (Melissa-vocal) / (22:14) Comments from Melissa / (22:38) Performs Unidentified Song likely titled Time Is On My Side (Kyle-vocal) / (25:12) Introduction of the next song / (25:32) Performs How's The World Treating You / (28:55) Comments from Kyle about meeting Melissa / (30:01) Introduces the next song / (30:07) Performs Merry-Go-Round (Melissa-vocal) / (33:55) Comments from Jim Hurst / (34:25) Kyle answers question about his musical history and influences / (36:18) Melissa answers question about her musical history and influences / (37:58) Kyle talks about upcoming performances / (39:02) Melissa talks about balancing her musical career with motherhood / (39:37) Introduces the next song / (40:40) Performs You Ain't Down Home / (44:15) Introduces the next song / (44:36) Performs Nightbird (Melissa-vocal) / (48:18) Comments from Kyle / (48:50) Introduces the next song / (49:06) Performs Wild Bill And Vivian (Melissa-vocal) / (52:25) Introduces the next song / (53:00) Performs Little Sadie (Melissa-vocal) / (55:54) Closing comments and introduction of the next song / (56:19) Performs Rocks and Water (Melissa-vocal) / (01:00:28) Final comments / (01:01:02) Walk-out music / ()01:02:28) FILE END
